def_cn: (板球中)得 6 分的击球，以 6 分记的击球
def_en: In cricket, if a player hits a six, they score six runs by hitting the ball so that it crosses the boundary at the edge of the playing area before it touches the ground.

def_cn: 使颇为不安;使受严重影响
def_en: If someone or something is hit for six or knocked for six, they are very upset or badly affected by an experience or piece of news.

def_cn: 困惑的;混乱的;杂乱无章的
def_en: If you say that someone or something is at sixes and sevens, you mean that they are confused or disorganized.
